â€œI have crazy bad chronic pain, and a pretty high tolerance to just about everything.

Black Widow is the exception.

It tastes and smells fantastic, and it's my go-to for pain, anxiety, and even sleep. It's a hybrid, but I feel it's indica side; my muscles relax, my headache fades, my nausea disappears and I drift off into peace.

It may be tricky to hunt down sometimes, but Black Widow is well worth it! (I also grea...â€
